name: Parisian Ratatouille
description: A classic French dish that is easy to make and full of flavor!
ingredients: 1 onion, diced, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 red bell pepper, diced, 1 zucchini, diced, 1 eggplant, diced, 1 can diced tomatoes, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 1 teaspoon dried basil, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon black pepper
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium heat and add the onion and garlic. Cook for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally., Add the bell pepper, zucchini, and eggplant. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally., Add the diced tomatoes, oregano, basil, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine., Reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally., Serve warm over rice or pasta.

name: Chicago-Style Italian Beef Sandwich
description: This classic Chicago-style Italian beef sandwich is easy to make and takes only a short time to prepare and cook. It's a great lunch option for anyone looking for a quick and delicious meal.
ingredients: 1 lb. beef roast, 1/2 cup beef broth, 1/4 cup Italian dressing, 1/4 cup giardiniera (pickled vegetables), 1/4 cup pepperoncini peppers, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon onion powder, 1/2 teaspoon Italian seasoning, 4 Italian rolls, Provolone cheese (optional)
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 350F., 2. Place beef roast in a baking dish and pour beef broth over it., 3. In a small bowl, mix together Italian dressing, giardiniera, pepperoncini peppers, garlic powder, onion powder, and Italian seasoning. Pour over the beef roast., 4. Cover the baking dish with foil and bake for 2 hours., 5. Remove the beef roast from the oven and shred with two forks., 6. Place the shredded beef on the Italian rolls and top with Provolone cheese, if desired., 7. Serve and enjoy!
